Content: that is why the CC approach is much better as you dont need to learn about all of blockchain coding. once you understand utxo you are halfway there

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
I think it's all about fundamental knowledge. The very very starting point for any dev MUST be the bitcoin whitepaper. And then some course online, which covers the whole topic. and there are few free online courses on introducing bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.

After bitcoin whitepaper, I'd highly recommend Mastering Bitcoin book by Andreas. It's amazing start for any developer.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: And after Mastering Bitcoin, read jl777's Mastering CryptoConditions.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: only 3 things in a to do list for a dev.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: and they can give ultimate challenge to any smart contract platform out there.
